name: Zombie Highway killer - Death Racing
description:
Zombie Highway killer
Endless game with zombie fear and road hurdles is all set to play by downloading Zombie Highway killer: Death Race. This amazing zombie run game is available for free to play and enjoy unlimited racing fun on your apple smart phone.
Zombie Highway killer: Death Race contains 3 astounding cars with defensive guns to fight with zombies. Racers need to maintain health bar by fighting zombie highway attackers and successfully cross road hurdles. Be a zombie hunter and smash them all with your powerful and NOS fuel superpower. Fly over roads and crisp zombies in to dust.
Zombie Highway killer: Death Race is an endless smartphone game with key goals of gaining extra game points. By playing this game racer can earn more points to unlock different cars and ammunition including super guns and much more.
Features of Zombie Highway killer
• Endless smooth game designed in all 3D patterns
• Different cars with outstanding look and modifications
• Inherited zombies, different modes of attack and road hurdles
• HD audio quality including background music, attacking sound, hurdle crossing sounds and more
• Endless game for unlimited fun and racing thrill
How to play
• Select your desired car from selection menu
• Tilt your smartphone or use left right arrow buttons to move and cross hurdles
• Shoot zombies through gun by pressing shooting button
• Use NOS to get rid of extra heavy zombie attackers
• Grab extra game points and scores by shooting zombies
• Maintain car health bar to avoid end of the game
